data.name: Sample - Fortinet FortiGate - 5.2.1
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Fortinet FortiGate" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get System Events
workflows.description: Retrieves system log data from Fortinet FortiGate server

workflows.name: Host: Unquarantine Host
workflows.description: Unquaratine Host on the Fortinet Fortigate server

workflows.name: Policy: Delete Policy
workflows.description: Delete specific policy based on input policy id provided.

workflows.name: Address Group: Get Address Groups
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all address groups that are configured on Fortinet FortiGate.

workflows.name: Users: Get Users
workflows.description: Retrieves list of all users that is configured on Fortinet FortiGate based on the name of the user you have specified

workflows.name: URL: Get Blocked URLs
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of URLs that are blocked on Fortinet FortiGate.Note: This operation always blocks URLs on the root VDOM and ignores VDOMs provided on the configuration page.

workflows.name: Address: Unblock IP Address
workflows.description: Unblocks IP addresses on Fortinet FortiGate using the IPv4 Block Policy that you have specified as the "action" parameter of Fortinet FortiGate. For more information see the "Blocking or Unblocking IP addresses, URLs, or applications in Fortinet FortiGate" section.Note: This operation is supported on all VDOMs.

workflows.name: Address: Create Address
workflows.description: Create new address in Fortinet FortiGate.

workflows.name: Address: Block IP Address
workflows.description: Blocks IP addresses on Fortinet FortiGate using the IPv4 Block Policy that you have specified as the \"action\" parameter of Fortinet FortiGate or by Quarantine based- adds IP into the banned IP list.

workflows.name: Address: Update Address
workflows.description: Update an existing address on Fortinet FortiGate server.

workflows.name: Address Group: Delete Address Group
workflows.description: Delete a specific address group that is configured on Fortinet FortiGate.

workflows.name: Host: Quarantine Host
workflows.description: Quarantine Host on the Fortinet Fortigate server

workflows.name: URL: Unblock URL
workflows.description: Unblocks URLs on Fortinet FortiGate using the Web Filter Profile Name that you have specified while configuring Fortinet FortiGate. For more information see the "Blocking or Unblocking IP addresses, URLs, or applications in Fortinet FortiGate" section.Note: This operation always unblocks URLs on the root VDOM and ignores VDOMs provided on the configuration page.

workflows.name: Service: Get Services
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all firewalls services or specific service based on given input which are configured on Fortinet FortiGate.

workflows.name: Address: Get Addresses
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all addresses that are configured on Fortinet FortiGate.

workflows.name: Service Group: Create Service Group
workflows.description: Creates new service group based on input parameters provided on Fortinet FortiGate.

workflows.name: Policy: Get List of Policies
workflows.description: Retrieves a list and details for all IPv4 policies that are configured on Fortinet FortiGate.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiGate: Get List of Policies

workflows.name: Service: Update Service
workflows.description: Update existing firewall service based on input parameters provided.

workflows.name: Service: Create Service
workflows.description: Create new service based on input parameters provided

workflows.name: Service Group: Update Service Group
workflows.description: Update specific service group based on inputs parameters provided on Fortinet FortiGate server.

workflows.name: Policy: Update Policy
workflows.description: Update an existing firewall policy based on input parameters provided.

workflows.name: Application: Block Application
workflows.description: Blocks applications on Fortinet FortiGate using the Application Control Profile Name that you have specified while configuring Fortinet FortiGate. For more information see the "Blocking or Unblocking IP addresses, URLs, or applications in Fortinet FortiGate" section.Note: This operation always blocks applications on the root VDOM and ignores VDOMs provided on the configuration page.

arguments.name: Fortinet FortiGate

workflows.name: Address Group: Create Address Group
workflows.description: Create new address group based on input parameters you have provided on Fortinet FortiGate server

workflows.name: Policy: Create Policy
workflows.description: Create new firewall policy based on input parameters provided.

workflows.name: User: Delete User
workflows.description: Deletes a user that is configured on Fortinet FortiGate based on the name of the user you have specified

workflows.name: Service Group: Get Service Groups
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all service groups or specific group based on inputs which are configured on Fortinet FortiGate.

workflows.name: URL: Block URL
workflows.description: Blocks URLs on Fortinet FortiGate using the Web Filter Profile Name Policy that you have specified while configuring Fortinet FortiGate. For more information see the "Blocking or Unblocking IP addresses, URLs, or applications in Fortinet FortiGate" section.Note: This operation always blocks URLs on the root VDOM and ignores VDOMs provided on the configuration page.

workflows.name: Application: Unblock Application
workflows.description: Unblocks applications on Fortinet FortiGate using the Application Control Profile Name that you have specified while configuring Fortinet FortiGate. For more information see the "Blocking or Unblocking IP addresses, URLs, or applications in Fortinet FortiGate" section.Note: This operation always unblocks applications on the root VDOM and ignores VDOMs provided on the configuration page.

workflows.name: Application: Get Blocked Applications
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of application names that are blocked on Fortinet FortiGate.Note: This operation is only supported on the root VDOM.
